DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety/tolerability and to explore the efficacy of MT-1303 in subjects with systemic lupus erythematosus
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Study of MT-1303 in Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Patients
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of SLE based on the American College of Rheumatology (ACR) criteria Presence of at least one of the following items: positive anti dsDNA antibodies, low complement levels, and so on. Stable doses of corticosteroids Severe active lupus nephritis, neuropsychiatric SLE
